channel.title: Level 300: CUR Queries on AWS Well-Architected Labs
channel.description: Recent content in Level 300: CUR Queries on AWS Well-Architected Labs

item.title: Analytics
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the Analytics product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents AWS Glue Query Description This query will provide daily unblended and usage information per linked account for AWS Glue.

item.title: Application Integration
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the Application Integration product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents Amazon MQ Query Description This query will provide daily unblended and amortized cost as well as usage information per linked account for Amazon MQ.

item.title: AWS Cost Management
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the AWS Cost Management product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents AWS Marketplace Query Description This query provides AWS Marketplace subscription costs including subscription product name, associated linked account, and monthly total unblended cost.

item.title: Compute
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the Compute product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents EC2 Total Spend Query Description This query will display the top costs for all spend with the product code of ‘AmazonEC2’.

item.title: Container
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the Container product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents Amazon Elastic Container Services Query Description This query will output the daily cost and usage per resource, by operation and service, for Elastic Consainer Services, ECS and EKS, both unblended and amortized costs are shown.

item.title: Database
item.description: These are queries for AWS Services under the Database product family . Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents Amazon RDS Query Description This query will output the daily sum per resource for all RDS purchase options across all RDS usage types.

Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents Amazon WorkSpaces Query Description This query will provide unblended cost and usage information per linked account for Amazon WorkSpaces.

item.title: Global Queries
item.description: These are queries which return information about global usage. Use the clipboard in the top right of the text boxes below to copy all of the text to be pasted. You may need to change variables used as placeholders in your query. ${table_Name} is a common variable which needs to be replaced. Example: cur_db.cur_table Table of Contents Account Query Description This query will provide monthly unblended and amortized costs per linked account for all services.
